name: @adobe/reactor-sdk
description: JavaScript SDK for the Reactor API

scripts.src:build:browser.bundle: npx parcel build -d dist -o reactor.min.js src/index.js --target browser
scripts.src:build: npx genversion --es6 src/version.js && npm-run-all src:clean src:lint --print-label --parallel 'src:build:*'
scripts.unit:build: npm run unit:clean && babel test/unit --out-dir tmp.tests/unit/ --source-maps --presets latest-node
scripts.integration:build:library: npx parcel build --no-minify --public-url=. -d tmp.tests/integration-library-sdk/ -o index.html test/integration/integration-tests-library-sdk.html --target browser
scripts.integration:build:bundled: npx parcel build --no-minify --public-url=. -d tmp.tests/integration-bundled-sdk/ -o index.html test/integration/integration-tests-bundled-sdk.html --target browser
scripts.integration:build:node: npx parcel build --no-minify --public-url=. -d tmp.tests/integration-in-node/ -o index.js test/integration/integration-tests-library-sdk.js --target node
scripts.integration:run: node scripts/check-version && open http://localhost:5000/integration-library-sdk/ && open http://localhost:5000/integration-bundled-sdk && NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx jasmine tmp.tests/integration-in-node/index.js
scripts.src-watch: nodemon --watch src/ --watch package.json --exec npm-run-all src:lint src:build
scripts.unit-watch: nodemon --watch lib/node --watch test/unit/ --exec npm run unit-tests
scripts.integration-watch: nodemon --watch lib/browser --watch test/integration/ --exec npm run integration-tests
scripts.all-watch: nodemon --watch package.json --watch src/ --watch test/ --exec npm run all-tests
